headline: Ameriprise Financial (AMP) Valuation Check After Mixed Recent Share Price Performance
summary: Ameriprise Financial: Recent Returns and Business Snapshot Ameriprise Financial (AMP) has seen mixed share performance recently, including a 4% decline over the past month and a 6.6% decline over the past year, alongside a positive 3 month return of 5.8%. The Minneapolis based firm reports annual revenue of US$18.5b and net income of US$3.6b. The company operates across advice and wealth management, asset management, and retirement and protection products for individual and institutional...
